Articles.Content:
This idea had spawned when I was making my original first two seasons of my KSP LP for my YouTube channel. The first 2 seasons of the LP were, let's face it, terribly done. I was an amateur when it came to video/audio editing, and some of the stuff I did made absolutely no sense. It seemed I was torn between making a Let's Play and a Machinima.

So, using my brain, I decided to do a Machinima in one playlist, and an LP in another.

Thusly was born the SaurKraut Legion.

Join Captain Jeb, Commander Bill, and their crew as they take the flagship of the SaurKraut Corporation's defense force around the system, protecting the Corporation's interests and assets. They'll have to deal with the politics of the Kerbin Triumvirate, the governing body on Kerbin; as well as piracy and the dastardly terrorist organization known as The Black Hand.

Countless hours have been spent constructing sets and ships, recording video sequences, wrestling with the proper codecs, recording audio, editing it all, and compiling it. As a bonus, my skills in doing all of this has steadily and drastically increased as I have quested to make a Machinima on the level of some of the greats. It's not perfect, but by episode 3, it looks pretty darn legit.

I'm currently working on set/ship-building for episode 4, and everything is going quite well.

Please head on over to my YouTube channel and check out The SaurKraut Legion! (Be advised: the characters are based on a typical military mindset. If you're offended by profanity, don't watch, or grow thicker skin and enjoy the humor and drama )

I'll start you off at episode 1, but the one I'm most proud of (until I upload ep4) is 3. Check it out for some good laughs, and (I think) a good story!

Please like on the videos, feel free to comment, and do me the ultimate honor of subscribing! Thank you all!

Edited June 5, 2014 by SaurKraut
Fixed Link; Added more background
You messed up the link, probably because you copied it from a page that shortened it with ....'s in place of the actual data.
Good catch! I went ahead and fixed that link! It still has the ...'s, but if you click it it'll take you there.

Filming has begun on the intro scene for episode 4!

I still have to build one more set for scene 3, and complete the new Black Hand ships...but that can wait. Let's see if we can get scene 1 done today!
Should finish audio/video editing on Scene 1 of Ep4 tonight!

It took me 2 hours, but I managed to get the first sequence filmed & produced for scene 2! Who knew it would be so much of a hassle to get 4 Kerbals to walk down a hallway "at the same time." Thank you, PowerDirector!
